name: Light At The End
description:
A survival choose-your-own-adventure game full of gallows humor and fun. 

Pilot an abandoned subway train, solve tricky puzzles, and make difficult decisions. Trade, eat canned food, and gather supplies. Make your way to Grand Central Station, and maybe don't get injured en route. All aboard! 

Features

  • Over 30+ events to explore
  • Nerve-wracking decisions
  • Tons of items and resources to collect
  • A secret ending...

Follow our Twitter for constant updates!

Download the Demo now!
